entry.title: Hello World!
entry.summary:
This article is a first post using Pelican, a static site generator using Python. It has extensive and well written documentation, and a nice file hierarchy.

This site is published via Github Pages.

It supports cool stuff, such as abbrevations like HTML.

It is also possible to include images: .. image:: ../images/test.jpg

Also, one can include code: .. code-block:: python

print "Hello World!"
